title: Heart of the Sovereign
description: Anger, anguish, distraction, and war -- a word that leaves a foul taste in your mouth.  It was something Robyn has started to grow used to while abroad the Apep.  Though Robyn never meant to start an outbreak between two different groups of people, somehow, that was exactly what happened, and she was stuck watching it all unfold.  When the Earth government declared all Elvain followers to be eliminated, she steps in, but what can one pregnant woman do when things seem to always fall apart?  With the help of her mates, Robyn tries to find a way to save the billions of innocent lives -- and she has do it fast.  Can she save her people by accepting the war Earth has declared? Or will she stand on the sidelines and watch her people die?   *****  This is a complete novel with a reverse harem storyline. There will be group sex and M/M scenes. Love has no borders when it comes to Aniketens sharing their love or their female amongst their nest. This is rated for those 18+. This book also contains foul language, and violence.
author: Samantha     Rose
